snippet: Activists affiliated with hacker groups reacted with anger and disdain at the man said to be the leader of Lulz Security almost as soon as the story of his cooperation with the F.B.I. emerged on Tuesday.
abstract: Activists affiliated with hacker groups reacted with anger and disdain at the man said to be the leader of Lulz Security almost as soon as the story of his cooperation with the F.B.I. emerged on Tuesday.

headline.main: Hackers Lash Out at LulzSec Leader Turned 'Snitch'
